verses.verse: Now it came <WH1961> about after <WH310> many <WH7227> days, <WH3117> when <WH310> <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> had given <WH5117> rest <WH5117> to Israel <WH3478> from all <WH3605> their enemies <WH340> on every <WH5439> side, <WH5439> and Joshua <WH3091> was old, <WH2204> advanced <WH935> in years, <WH3117>

that Joshua <WH3091> called <WH7121> for all <WH3605> Israel, <WH3478> for their elders <WH2205> and their heads <WH7218> and their judges <WH8199> and their officers, <WH7860> and said <WH559> to them, "I am <WH2204> old, <WH2204> advanced <WH935> in years. <WH3117>

"And you have seen <WH7200> all <WH3605> that the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> has done <WH6213> to all <WH3605> these <WH428> nations <WH1471> because <WH4480> <WH6440> of you, for the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> is He who has been fighting <WH3898> for you.

"See, <WH7200> I have apportioned <WH5307> to you these <WH428> nations <WH1471> which remain <WH7604> as an inheritance <WH5159> for your tribes, <WH7626> with all <WH3605> the nations <WH1471> which <WH834> I have cut <WH3772> off, <WH3772> from the Jordan <WH3383> even to the Great <WH1419> Sea <WH3220> toward the setting <WH3996> of the sun. <WH8121>

"And the Lord <WH3068> your God, <WH430> He shall thrust <WH1920> them out from before <WH6440> you and drive <WH3423> them from before <WH6440> you; and you shall possess <WH3423> their land, <WH776> just <WH9201> as the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> promised <WH1696> you.

"Be very <WH3966> firm, <WH2388> then, to keep <WH8104> and do <WH6213> all <WH3605> that is written <WH3789> in the book <WH5612> of the law <WH8451> of Moses, <WH4872> so that you may not turn <WH5493> aside <WH5493> from it to the right <WH3225> hand <WH3225> or to the left, <WH8040>

in order that you may not associate <WH935> with these <WH428> nations, <WH1471> these <WH428> which remain <WH7604> among <WH854> you, or mention <WH2142> the name <WH8034> of their gods, <WH430> or make [anyone] swear <WH7650> [by them,] or serve <WH5647> them, or bow <WH7812> down <WH7812> to them.
"But you are to cling <WH1692> to the Lord <WH3068> your God, <WH430> as you have done <WH6213> to this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

"For the Lord <WH3068> has driven <WH3423> out great <WH1419> and strong <WH6099> nations <WH1471> from before <WH6440> you; and as for you, no <WH3808> man <WH376> has stood <WH5975> before <WH6440> you to this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

"One <WH259> of your men <WH376> puts <WH7291> to flight <WH7291> a thousand, <WH505> for the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> is He who fights <WH3898> for you, just <WH9201> as He promised <WH1696> you.
"So take <WH8104> diligent <WH3966> heed <WH8104> to yourselves <WH5315> to love <WH157> the Lord <WH3068> your God. <WH430>

"For if <WH518> you ever <WH7725> go <WH7725> back <WH7725> and cling <WH1692> to the rest <WH3499> of these <WH428> nations, <WH1471> these <WH428> which remain <WH7604> among <WH854> you, and intermarry <WH2859> with them, so that you associate <WH935> with them and they with you,

know <WH3045> with certainty <WH3045> that the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> will not continue <WH3254> to drive <WH3423> these <WH428> nations <WH1471> out from before <WH6440> you; but they shall be a snare <WH6341> and a trap <WH4170> to you, and a whip <WH7850> on your sides <WH6654> and thorns <WH6796> in your eyes, <WH5869> until <WH5704> you perish from off <WH6> this <WH5921> good <WH2088> land <WH2896> which <WH127> the Lord <WH834> your God <WH3068> has given <WH430> you.

"Now behold, <WH2009> today <WH3117> I am going <WH1980> the way <WH1870> of all <WH3605> the earth, <WH776> and you know <WH3045> in all <WH3605> your hearts <WH3824> and in all <WH3605> your souls <WH5315> that not one <WH259> word <WH1697> of all <WH3605> the good <WH2896> words <WH1697> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> spoke <WH1696> concerning <WH5921> you has failed; <WH5307> all <WH3605> have been fulfilled <WH935> for you, not one <WH259> of them has failed. <WH5307>

"And it shall come <WH1961> about that just <WH9201> as all <WH3605> the good <WH2896> words <WH1697> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> spoke <WH1696> to you have come <WH935> upon you, so <WH3651> the Lord <WH3068> will bring <WH935> upon you all <WH3605> the threats, <WH7451> <WH1697> until <WH5704> He has destroyed <WH8045> you from off <WH5921> this <WH2088> good <WH2896> land <WH776> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> has given <WH5414> you.

"When you transgress <WH5674> the covenant <WH1285> of the Lord <WH3068> your God, <WH430> which <WH834> He commanded <WH6680> you, and go <WH1980> and serve <WH5647> other <WH312> gods, <WH430> and bow <WH7812> down <WH7812> to them, then the anger <WH639> of the Lord <WH3068> will burn <WH2734> against you, and you shall perish quickly <WH6> from off <WH4120> the good <WH5921> land <WH2896> which <WH776> He has given <WH834> you."
